content.prompt: Let g be a twice-differentiable function with g’(x) > 0 and g”(x) > 0 for all real numbers x, such that g(4) = 12 and g(5) = 18 Of the following, which is a possible value for g(6)?

topic.text: 5.3: Determining Intervals on Which a Function Is Increasing or Decreasing

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Explain how an approximated value relates to the actual value.
